issue.title: docs(README): typo
issue.body:
### This PR will...

Fix document `didMountCallback` & `willUnmountCallback` params

### Why is this Pull Request needed?

It will be misunderstood by others

### Are there any points in the code the reviewer needs to double check?

No

### Are there any Pull Requests open in other repos which need to be merged with this?

No

#### Addresses Issue(s):

JW8-#####

comment.body: Can one of the admins verify this patch?

issue.title: Component should only update if a player exists
issue.body:
### This PR will...
- In `shouldComponentUpdate()` we are checking if the player exists, and will then update event listeners. Currently event listeners are being updated before a player exists and that causes errors.

### Why is this Pull Request needed?
- Currently the repo is not usable with on<Event> listener.

### Are there any points in the code the reviewer needs to double check?

### Are there any Pull Requests open in other repos which need to be merged with this?
- No

#### Addresses Issue(s):
- https://github.com/jwplayer/jwplayer-react/issues/12

comment.body: Can one of the admins verify this patch?
